news_header: Mettler-Toledo reported strong quarterly results with significant revenue growth and EPS increase, amid a growing demand for nuclear energy.
news_original_title: Compared to Estimates, Mettler-Toledo (MTD) Q4 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
news_text: Mettler-Toledo (MTD) achieved $1.05 billion in revenue for the quarter ending December 2024, an 11.8% increase year-over-year. The EPS was $12.41, up from $9.40 a year ago, surpassing the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $11.69. The company is positioned well as global leaders commit to tripling nuclear energy capacities, suggesting potential profits for investors in nuclear stocks. The report highlights key players and technologies in the nuclear sector.
